title: Vaneck Director: People Tend to Underestimate Long-Term Impact of Spot Bitcoin ETFs
description: Vaneck’s director of digital assets strategy has explained why people tend to underestimate the long-term impact of spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs). He believes that upon the approval of a U.S. spot bitcoin ETF by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), “bitcoin’s price trajectory could follow gold’s blueprint from 2004 and the years after, just […]

title: Debunking the Notion of the ‘AI Bubble’ with a Realistic Lens – A Take on Doctorow’s Perspective
description: A recent post by Cory Doctorow has sparked a debate in the tech world by questioning the widely accepted narrative of the AI boom and raising predictions about the imminent collapse of the so-called “AI bubble.” Beyond the surface-level skepticism, Doctorow’s piece prompts a deeper exploration into the existing inefficiencies that plague contemporary businesses. The […]
